table.name: vtiger_listfoods
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_listfoods` ( `listfoodsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `food_type` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `code` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`listfoodsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_listfoodscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_listfoodscf` ( `listfoodsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`listfoodsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
